maqras.text: 76|19|Mata eien no shonen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o 往米 Shi, anata ga kare-ra o miru to, maki chirasa reta shinjudearu to omoudearou.
76|20|Anata wa shisen o mukeru to shifuku no sodaina sangoku o shitatamerudearou.
76|21|Kare-ra wa utsukushi midoriiro no kinu to nishiki no soto i o matoi, gin no udewa de kazara re,-nushi wa kare-ra ni junryona nomimono o noma se rareru.
76|22|`Hontoni kore wa anata gata ni taisuru hoshodearu. Anata gata no doryoku ga uke haira reta nodearu.'(To ose rareyou).
76|23|Ware koso wa, dankai o o tte anata ni kuruan o kudashita monodearu.
76|24|Dakara (dendo ni sen'nen shi), anata no omo no shinpan o taeshinonde mate. Kare-ra no naka no tsumi aru mono ya, fushinjin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai.
76|25|Asanayuna, anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi nasai.
76|26|Soshite yoru no ichibu o kare ni sajida shi, choya no shijima ni, kare o tatae nasai.
76|27|Hontoni korera no mono wa, tsukanoma no seikatsu o aishi, judaina-bi o haigo ni sutesaru.
76|28|Kare o tsukuri, sono shishi o kataku baku gi tometa no wa ware deru. Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra to ruiji no soto no mono de oki kaeru koto mo dekiru nodearu.
76|29|Hontoni kore wa hitotsu no kunkaidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kare no omo e no michi o tora se nasai.
76|30|Daga arra ga o nozomi ni naranakereba, anata gata wa hosshinaidearou. Arra wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
76|31|Kare wa, o kokoronikanau-sha o jihi ni yoku sa se, mata fugi no to ni taishite wa tsuretsuna chobatsu o sonae rareru.
77|1|Tsugitsugini okura reru kaze ni oi te.
77|2|Moi o fu u kaze ni oi te.
77|3|Ame o motarasu kaze ni oi te.
77|4|Shinri to kyogi o kubetsu suru (kuruan no) keiji ni oi te.
77|5|Keiji o yogen-sha-tachi ni tsutaeru tenshi-tachi ni oite (chikau).
77|6|Arra kara no o satoshi to keikoku to shite (tsutaete iru).
77|7|(Makka no haishin-sha yo. ) Anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto (fukkatsu no hi to chobatsu) ga tashika ni okoru.
77|8|Moroboshi ga kesa reru toki,
77|9|ten ga sake chiru toki,
77|10|yamayama ga chiri no yo ni hakobi sara reru toki,
77|11|shito-tachi ga sadame rareta toki ni shoshu sa reru toki,
77|12|(sorera wa) itsu no hi made yuyo sa reta no ka.
77|13|Sabaki no hi madedearu.
77|14|Sabaki no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
77|15|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|16|Ware wa (akugyo no tame ni) zendai no mono o horobosanakatta ka.
77|17|Sonogo ware wa, kodai no mono ni kare-ra o tsuga setade wanai ka.
77|18|Kono yo ni ware wa tsumi no aru-sha-tachi o jobunsuru.
77|19|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|20|Ware wa anata gata o iyashi mizu kara tsukuttade wanai ka.
77|21|Ware wa sore o, antaina yasumi-sho (shikyu) ni oita,
77|22|sadame rareta jiki made.
77|23|Ware wa so sadameta. Waga kettei no nanto yoi koto yo.
77|24|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|25|Ware wa, daichi o okina yoki to shinakatta ka,
77|26|seizon-sha to shisha (soho no tame ni).
77|27|Sono-jo ni yamayama o takaku sobie sase, mata Shin 鮮Na mizu o anata gata ni noma setade wanai ka.
77|28|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|29|(Ose rareyou. ) `Omomuke, anata gataga usodearu to itte kita tokoro (jigoku) e.
77|30|Omomuke, anata gata 3ttsu no eda (ni tachi noboru kemuri) no in ni.'
77|31|Soreha kage ni mo narazu, mata moesakaru hono ni taishite wa yakunitatanaidearou.
77|32|Soreha (kyodaina) toride no yona hono o haki,
77|33|chodo (kyohon suru) kokasshoku no rakuda no yo.
77|34|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|35|Sore wa, hatsugen suru koto ga dekinai hideari,
77|36|mata moshi-biraki mo, kare-ra ni yurusarenaidearou.
77|37|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|38|Sore wa sabaki no hideari, ware wa anata gata mo (anata gata) izen no mono-tachi mo, issho ni atsumeru.
77|39|Anata gata ni nanika jussaku ga aru nonara, ware ni mukatte sakubo suruga i.
77|40|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|41|Omo o osoreru mono wa, hontoni (suzushi) kage to izumi no ma ni irudarou.
77|42|Kare-ra ga hossuru, subete no kajitsu (o eru).
77|43|`Kokoronosokokara manzoku shite tabe katsu nome, anata gata (no yoi) okonai o shita koto ni taishite.'(To ware wa iou. )
77|44|Kono yo ni ware wa, yoi okonai no mono-tachi ni mukuiru.
77|45|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|46|(Anata gata fugi no mono yo. ) `Shibashi no ma tabe katsu kyoraku suruga i. Hontoni anata gata wa tsumibukaimonodearu.'
77|47|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|48|Kare-ra wa,`ritsurei 〔rukuu〕 seyo.' To iwa rete mo ryurei shinai.
77|49|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|50|Kono (kuruan) o sashioite, don'na oshie o kare-ra wa shinjiyou to suru no ka.
